Name: MS Lite_a01 [Pub]
Description:
EnemiesNoSync Edition, For Pubbing. REQUIRES CD2 B15+. This is ND-flavored difficulty (With some ERR enemies added but not entire Elite promote system) but use mostly Vanilla Assets. Partially inspired by zeta's Death Series.
    Alpha 10:
  - Trawler now only spawn on Sandblasted Biome
